nodes.body: :v: YaelDillies can now approve this pull request. To approve and merge a pull request, simply reply with `bors r+`. More detailed instructions are available [here](https://bors.tech/documentation/getting-started/#reviewing-pull-requests).

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7437738674/job/20235706461)
  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7437738674/job/20235706300)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7437738674/job/20235706408)

**[lint-style]** reported by [reviewdog](https://github.com/reviewdog/reviewdog) :dog:
```suggestion simp [← range_comp, mul_comm, Function.comp, starRingEnd_apply, Subset.rfl] ```

**[lint-style]** reported by [reviewdog](https://github.com/reviewdog/reviewdog) :dog:
```suggestion @[simp] lemma star_nonpos : star x ≤ 0 ↔ x ≤ 0 := by simp_rw [← neg_nonneg, ← star_neg, star_nonneg] @[simp] lemma star_neg' : star x < 0 ↔ x < 0 := by simp_rw [← neg_pos, ← star_neg, star_pos] ```

```suggestion
```
This seems to do nothing since there is no other change in that file.
Whoops sorry yes. I added changes and subsequently deleted them.
Any chance to add `isSelfAdjoint_ofNat` while we're at it?

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat: Every star ring is a `Nat`-star module
